constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: An application under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 is one whereby the Local Planning Authority confirms whether a proposed amendment is material or non-material, taking into account the considerations as set out in the Act.The application seeks to ascertain whether the changes proposed, to replace render with face brickwork, removal of one chimney and minor changes to fenestration, are Non Material Amendment.Officers conclude that the changes proposed both individually and cumulatively are considered to be greater than non-material changes and as such, would not constitute a non material amendment.
description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 20/02097/FUL (Demolition of existing dwelling and erection of a replacement dwelling) to replace render with face brickwork, removal of one chimney and minor changes to fenestration.
